pages.text: I know I can survive in this world, but it won't be easy. My first priority should be to find some wood to make tools and a weapon. Next, I should gather whatever resources I can and prepare to make a shelter before the sun sets. Whatever the night brings, it won't be pleasant.

Oddly enough, I feel like the daytime and nighttime lasts much longer than usual. How I came across this revelation is unbeknownst to me, but my intuition tells me the day and night cycle is 2 times longer than what it should be...
Surviving in this world alone may prove to be a daunting task. I might try and look for others like me to take on this world together as a team.
